example_sentence_italian: Tu desti il bambino troppo presto.
example_sentence_english: You wake the child too early.

example_sentence_italian: Voi destate i bambini ogni mattina.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) wake the children every morning.

translation_english: I was awakening/I used to awaken
example_sentence_english: I used to wake up early.

example_sentence_italian: Tu destavi il bimbo ogni giorno.
example_sentence_english: You used to wake the baby every day.

translation_english: he was awakening/she was awakening/you (formal) were awakening

example_sentence_italian: Loro destavano i vicini la mattina.
example_sentence_english: They used to wake the neighbors in the morning.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'destato'
used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'destato'

translation_english: he has awakened/she has awakened/you (formal) have awakened
